Page 2 of 2 Pages
RHODE ISLAND COMMITTEE ON EDUCATIONAL TV, Providence, R.I. (Television Council)
Application made by Albert J. KcAfoon, representing the Rhode Island Juvenile Court.
No other information available.
BOARD OF PUBLIC INSTRUCTIONS Jacksonville, Florida (Production Center)
Application made by Julian D. Morse in the name of the Audio-Visual Department of
the Jacksonville Schools.
Applicant states production center has used and is using facilities of Radio Stations
WJHP and WIVY, commercial outlets in Jacksonville on a regular basis.
Most of programs produced in own studios and tape recorded for delayed broadcast.
Studio is 9* x 14®. Technical Equipment: Kagnecord Tape Recorders, 4 mikes, 1 turntable.
List of 1951-52 productions rather distinctive. Ten weekly series together uLthweddy
music series. 1952-53 plans include Youth Forum series and Homemakers Series.
ROOSEVELT COLLEGE, Chicago, Illinois (Production Center)
Application made by Edward J. Sparling, President of the College.
Applicant states college is accredited by North Central Association and other accredit¬
ing agencies; that college, at present time, is presenting over WB&B, Chicago, weekly
half hour television show and several short radio series over FM stations.
Staff of two working with TV and radio and other from college staff as needed.
MISS DOROTHY TICHENER. RADIO & TV CHAIRMAN (Individual)
National Federation, Business & Professional Women*s Clubs, Xnc.
Miss Tichener*s responsibility is that of coordinating the radio and TV programming
of the various National, State and Local Chairmen of BFi, Federation numbers 160,000
and some 2,900 clubs. Each state federation has a Radio & TV Chairman as well as each
local club. "My idea in seeking associate membership was that we might effect a
cooperative basis of operation being of some help to you and at the same time aligning
ourselves with your operations”.
CLIP.CAST YOUR VOTE & RETURN IMMEDIATELY TO JIM MILES
On the basis of the report given by the Chairman of the Membership Conanittee on the
applicants for Active and Associate Membership in NAEB, I vote as follows:
ACTIVE: Griffith Institute & Central School...Yes__No
ASSOCIATE: Museum of the City of New York...Yes_No
President’s Roan, Alliance College............Yes_No"
R.I. Committee on Educational TV......Yes_No"
Board of Public Instruction, Jacksonville, Fla....Yes_No"
Roosevelt College, Chicago, Illinois.Yea_No"
Miss Dorothy Tichner, BFW...Yes No"

Official Position with NAEB
